description:
Our early childhood education program is free to families meeting State income and need requirements. Children must be 3-years-old by September 1st of the current school year. Part day and Full day programs are available, please contact 916-566-1616 for further information. 
 
Our preschool special education program is designed to meet the educational needs of preschool age children who have significant language, social and behavioral needs that cannot be met in the regular preschool classroom. Services include specialized academic instruction, speech and language services, behavioral support and educationally based occupational therapy. 
Our Mission
Our Vision
